resources.string: slouchie is the easiest way to maintain correct posture.
slouchie is the easiest way to maintain correct posture.
Sit upright, slouchie will start in
First, enable slouchie on your phone by pressing the button above.\n
Then, put your phone in your pocket. \nMake sure it tilts when you slouch.
Sit upright. Your phone will vibrate if you need to correct your posture. \nIt\'s that simple!
If you feel slouchie is working incorrectly try setting the alert angle. \nIt tells slouchie how soon it should react when you change your posture.
If you have trouble feeling initial slouchie vibration signals, try turning longer vibration on.
